channel.title: How do i make my server so people can yell
channel.description: well i was wondering how do i add that people can yell cuz currently no 1 can yell not even owners i am currently using paradise source w.e

item.title: How do i make my server so people can yell
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

Uhm use server help, this is client help…

and theres a command for it such as my command for all diffrent statuses…:

[code]}
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastYelled > 10000) {
String titles = “”;
if (donator == 1) {
titles = "[Donator] ";
lastYelled = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = "[Hidden Admin] ";
lastYelled = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator] ";
lastYelled = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Admin] ";
lastYelled = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
lastYelled = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if(muted){
sM(“You cannot ::yell , because you are muted!”);
lastYelled = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Michael”)) {
titles = “[>>[OWNER]<<]-”;
lastYelled = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mike”)) {
titles = “[>>[OWNER]<<]-”;
lastYelled = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“holy skillzz”)) {
titles = “[CODER]-”;
lastYelled = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));

				}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server so people can yell
